description.value:
The Lord of Conquest reigns over despots, conquerors, tyrants, and the iron-fisted. He promotes cruel rule, and was once a warlord of the Adversaries himself.

Edicts: Topple unworthy rulers, dominate those beneath you, show deference to your betters.

Anathema: Show mercy, show deference to the weak or unworthy, make peace when you have the advantage.

Areas of Concern: War, tyranny, hierarchy.
